articles.description: International sports are largely on hold. Borders are closed, and a vaccine is not expected to be available soon. The 2021 Games are anything but a slam dunk.
articles.content:
It has been two months since the International Olympic Committee and officials in Japan agreed to postpone the 2020 Olympic Games for a year.
In that time, one thing has become clear: The Tokyo Game… [+8483 chars]

articles.title: Gronk reenacts Brady 'crying' on the phone for him to come to Tampa Bay - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: Gronk playfully acted like he was Tom Brady crying into the phone asking him to play for the Buccaneers.
articles.content: Superstar NFL tight end Rob Gronkowski appeared on The Late Late Show With James Corden Thursday night and did a very dramatic reenactment of the phone call in which his former New England Patriots q… [+1529 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Carlisle
articles.title: MLS Orlando tournament taking shape with four seeded groups - sources - ESPN
articles.description: MLS would split the 26 teams into four groups, with the top two teams in each group advancing to a knockout round, sources have confirmed ESPN.
articles.content: The details surrounding the proposed MLS "mini-tournament" in Orlando are coming into focus, with the league breaking the 26 teams into four groups and with the top two teams in each group advancing … [+3218 chars]

articles.title: Cowboys' Aldon Smith reinstated by NFL under substance-abuse policy | Pro Football Talk | NBC Sports - NBC Sports
articles.description: Aldon Smith was reinstated under the substance-abuse policy by the NFL, and he will join the Cowboys' roster after not playing since 2015. #NBCSports #ProFoo...
